# ============================================================================
# GENERATED BY PARA, PopcornSAR
# Copyright(c) 2024 by PopcornSAR Co.,Ltd. All rights reserved.
# ============================================================================
 
add_executable(${PARA_APP_NAME})
 
# ============================================================================
# This setting is required for binary targets.
# Please modify the section below to suit your configuration.
# ============================================================================
Para_Target(${PARA_APP_NAME}
            PARA_LIBS_PRIVATE core log exec com
            PARA_GEN_DIR ${PARA_APP_GEN_DIR}
            OUTPUT_NAME ${PARA_APP_NAME}
)
# ============================================================================
target_include_directories(${PARA_APP_NAME}
                           PRIVATE
                           ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include)
# ============================================================================
target_link_libraries(${PARA_APP_NAME}
                      PRIVATE
                      pthread
                      stdc++fs)
# ============================================================================
target_sources(${PARA_APP_NAME}
               PRIVATE
               exe_obstaclecruiseplanner/aa/port/pport_ocp2evls.cpp
               exe_obstaclecruiseplanner/aa/port/pport_ocp2ss.cpp
               exe_obstaclecruiseplanner/aa/port/rport_mvp2ocp.cpp
               exe_obstaclecruiseplanner/aa/port/rport_scr2ocp.cpp
               exe_obstaclecruiseplanner/aa/port/pport_ocp2scr.cpp
               exe_obstaclecruiseplanner/aa/swc_obstaclecruiseplanner.cpp
               main.cpp
)

# ============================================================================
# Copy reference_output folder to build directory
# ============================================================================
add_custom_command(TARGET ${PARA_APP_NAME} PRE_BUILD
                   COMMAND ${CMAKE_COMMAND} -E copy_directory
                   ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../OSS_TEST_HELPER/reference_output
                   ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/reference_output
                   COMMENT "Copying reference_output to build directory"
)
